data.title: Brenham Memorial Chapel
data.meta_description: Brenham Memorial Chapel - Current obituaries and funeral services held in Brenham, Texas.
data.text:
William “Bill” Thomas Brooks, after a full and happy life, went to be with Jesus while surrounded by love and family. He left this life at the age of 85, on August 11, 2024. Bill, son of Benjamin Brooks and Adele Wheeler, was born on April 28, 1939, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, where he grew up...

Ron is now playing golf on the most perfect golf course. Tee time was 3:30 pm on July 7, 2024. This course has long, wide fairways, no roughs, no water hazards, no sand traps and the greens are well manicured. Drives are always straight and he will always ‘one putt’ the greens. There are never...

Randy Steven Bedford, a resident of Greenvine, beloved husband, father and grandfather, passed away Monday night at home with his wife of 25 years, after a heroic battle with cancer. Randy was just two weeks shy of his 70th birthday. Randy was born in San Antonio to Arlas and Jenelle Bedford. A...

Bexley Gayle Weige passed away in the embrace of family on July 28, 2024. Bexley was born on June 18, 2024 to Derek Ernest Weige and Lindsey Gayle Schubert, joined with siblings Cole, Tripp, Westin and Riley. It is with heavy hearts that we honor and say goodbye to our precious baby...

Mary Louise Hoff, age 96, formerly of Brenham, passed away July 27, 2024 in Lakeway, TX. Mary was born in the Rehburg community outside of Burton, Texas on August 24, 1927 to Gustav and Alma Fischer. Mary was baptized and confirmed in her Christian faith at St. Paul Lutheran Church. Mary wed...

David Earl Herrington, 72, of Katy, was welcomed into the kingdom of heaven with wide open and loving arms on May 6, 2024, surrounded by his wife, children, and cherished cousin. David was born July 28, 1951, to Earl and Ruth Herrington in Harlingen, Texas. He graduated from Edinburg High School...

William “Bill” Clanahan passed away on Thursday, July 11, 2024 in Tomball, TX after a hard fought battle with glioblastoma. Bill was born July 15, 1956, in Hobart, Oklahoma to Elmer and Helen Clanahan. He graduated Hobart High School in 1974 and went on to attend Oklahoma University where he...

David Januszewski passed away from this life on July 3, 2024 at his home in Brenham, TX. He was born on November 19, 1963 in St. Jude Hospital in Brenham. He was baptized into the Catholic faith at St. Mary's Catholic Church by Msgr. Charles Weisnerowski and confirmed in the same church by Bishop...

Ralph Harres Martin, 98, of Brenham, Texas, went to be with the Lord on July 2, 2024. Ralph was born in Atchison, Kansas April 14, 1926 to Thelma Wilson Martin and Harres Crawford Martin. He grew up in Atchison along with his 4 siblings Paul, Donna, Ann and Marilyn. Ralph met his wife Theon...

Michael James Dudich was born on March 24, 1981 to parents Tim Dudich and Karen Vesper Winkelmann in Akron, Ohio. He was baptized at Messiah Lutheran Church on May 24, 1981 and was confirmed at Immanuel Lutheran Church on June, 4 1995. He graduated with the Brenham High School Class of 1999 and...

Brenda J. Mize, 66, of Magnolia, Texas, entered eternal rest on Wednesday, June 26, 2024. Brenda Mize was born September 1, 1957 in Houston, Texas to Herman and Betty (Stepan) Hoff. She was baptized on December 29, 1957 in Nelsonville, Texas. On March 26, 1977, she married Steven Mize at St....

Dorothy Lavina Stanford, 92, of Brenham joined her heavenly father on June 27, 2024. Dorothy was born January 12, 1932 in Louise, Texas to Emil and Mabel (Bissett) Schoeneberg. She was baptized March 20, 1932 in El Campo by Pastor R.A. Schmidt and confirmed in 1947 by Pastor Edwin Lampe....

Jerry Kieke passed away Wednesday, June 26, 2024 in College Station, TX. Jerry was born February 6, 1949 in Brenham, to Edwin and Anita (Dreyer) Kieke. He was baptized March 27, 1949 and confirmed June 2, 1963 both at Immanuel Lutheran Church of Wiedeville. He attended Brenham schools and...

Melvin Lee Dahse, 89 passed away surrounded by family on July 1, 2024. Melvin was born in Kenney, January 19, 1935 to Ida and Lee Dahse. He was a graduate of Bellville High School. He served his Country and was Honorably Discharged from the Army of the United States on April 30,...
